attributes.action: Meet and Talk to any terrorist organisation who offer a hand of Piece
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is disgraceful that the whole world is under the threat of violence from Terrorists. Regretably due to the easiness of world travel we are unable to close the gates and keep them from our shores.
Any offer of piece should be persued at every oppertunity sickening though it may be.The war in Irland is an example.
